entry.title: ACHEBE DRESS (blue)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type:
Price: 180.00

The masterpiece tunic crafted from a patchwork of upcycled Akwette fabric is truly remarkable. This creation is a testament to our commitment to minimizing waste in production and embracing sustainable fashion practices. This tunic exudes a sense of responsibility and dedication to sustainable fashion, embracing a loose, comfortable fit with two straps and a dress length of 32 inches.

  • Dress length: 32 inches, ensuring comfort and style
  • Loose fit and two straps for a relaxed and easy-wearing experience
  • open sides
  • Dry clean only
  • Due to its upcycled nature no two Achebe tunics are exactly the same.Â 
  • Do not soak or bleach

entry.title: Akweke Kaftan in Chalk
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type: Dress
Price: 250.00 - 285.00 (4 variants)

The Akweke Kaftan is a stunning garment crafted from the finest Akweke design, showcasing the artistry and craftsmanship involved in creating this garment.

The kaftan structure is carefully prioritized for comfort, allowing for ease of movement and a relaxed fit. It is designed to drape gracefully on your body, providing a flattering and flowing silhouette.

Whether worn for a special occasion or as a statement piece, this kaftan is sure to make a lasting impression.

  • Dress length: 60 inches
  • Loose fit for ease of movement and a relaxed, elegant look

entry.title: Ronti Dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type:
Price: 145.00

The Ronti dress is undeniably designed for the fashion girlie who wants to make a statement. With a boned strapless upper bodice, this dress offers a structured and flattering fit that accentuates the upper body. The threaded bottom half introduces a playful and unique element to the design, creating visual interest. As an upcycled piece, it incorporates an eco-friendly aspect into its appeal. By choosing an upcycled dress like Ronti, you not only make a fashion statement but also contribute to sustainable fashion practices.

  • Tailored for the fashion trailblazer craving uniqueness and sophistication
  • The threaded bottom half adds a touch of creativity and originality
  • An upcycled gem, aligning with your commitment to sustainable fashion
  • Dry clean only

entry.title: Akwete Dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hertunba
Type:
Price: 145.00

The Akwete Dress, a sophisticated straight-cut maxi dress made from colourful Akwete fabric, offers a simple and elegant silhouette. Its clean and streamlined look suits all body types, providing a timeless appeal.

The Akwete fabric adds a unique touch, highlighting traditional African textiles and craftsmanship. Featuring two delicate spaghetti straps, the dress combines style with support, and the side zip ensures easy wear and removal.

  • Crafted from the exquisite Akwette fabric, reflecting cultural heritage and luxury
  • Fabric offers no stretch, ensuring a true-to-size fit that flatters your silhouette
  • In a bid to remain sustainable, this dress is not cut with placement pattern, which means that each dress may feature a slightly different weaving pattern, making each dress unique to its owner.Â 
  • Â Hand wash only
  • Do not soak or bleach

entry.summary:

The Amie dress is a captivating fusion of elegance and tradition, crafted from a blend of handwoven Akwette and soft cotton fabric. The combination of these materials adds a unique and luxurious touch to the garment. The T-shirt style-inspired upper bodice delicately hugs the form, creating a flattering and comfortable fit. Drawing inspiration from the voluminous skirts of a masquerade, the lower part of the dress showcases the richness of cultural heritage. Wearing this dress allows you to remain loyal to cultural traditions while exuding contemporary sophistication.
